version_description: App stability and user experience improvements
Handling jam state during kit setup, catching incorrect camera cable, persistent low battery alert and minor Ux improvements for daily and delivery use.

You can now mount camera upside down and rotate live view 180 degrees in settings.
While attempting to make In-Home delivery, if the delivery associate could not open your door due to pets or safety reasons, you will see that messaging in the app.
Y

• After a lock/unlock, we will notify you if the app cannot verify the lock status for any reason.
• Live view detects camera issues faster so that you can take action.

• You now have the ability to mute/unmute audio from live view.
• If you set your Cloud Cam audio recording OFF, we will let you know that the audio recording will be turned ON during delivery.
• Improved messaging when deliveries are made to househ

• You can now rate your delivery from the delivery detail page.
• You can now see package item details on the delivery card and the delivery detail page.
• The delivery clip is auto-played when you go to the delivery detail page.

• You now have the ability to enable Touch ID / Face ID (on supported devices) in settings for additional security in the app.
• You can now get motion clips for every entry and exit.
• You have the option of opting-in to in-home delivery during kit

• Prime members with eligible Chevrolet, GMC, Cadillac, Buick and Volvo cars can now use Amazon Key to have their Amazon packages delivered inside their vehicles.
• Improved troubleshooting experience for lock offline scenarios. We now provide a link t

• Prime members with eligible Chevrolet, GMC, Cadillac, Buick and Volvo cars can now use Amazon Key to have their Amazon packages delivered inside their vehicles.
• Improved troubleshooting for ‘lock not found’ error during setup.
• Improved messag

• Prime members with eligible Chevrolet, GMC, Cadillac, Buick and Volvo cars can now use Amazon Key to have their Amazon packages delivered inside their vehicles.
• Bug fixes and general improvements

• Prime members with eligible Chevrolet, GMC, Cadillac, Buick and Volvo cars can now use Amazon Key to have their Amazon packages delivered inside their vehicles.
• Bug fixes and general improvements

• Prime members with eligible Chevrolet, GMC, Cadillac, Buick and Volvo cars can now use Amazon Key to have their Amazon packages delivered inside their vehicles.
• Bug fixes and general improvements

• Prime members with eligible Chevrolet, GMC, Cadillac, Buick and Volvo cars can now use Amazon Key to have their Amazon packages delivered inside their vehicles.
• Bug fixes

• Prime members with eligible Chevrolet, GMC, Cadillac, Buick and Volvo cars can now use Amazon Key to have their Amazon packages delivered inside their vehicles.
• Bug fixes
• Amazon Key packages coming in the same delivery time are now grouped inside the Amazon Key App!

• Encode Wi-Fi lock now supported, with updates to improve performance with Schlage app.
• Bug fixes and general improvements

With this release, Key by Amazon brings you new capabilities in your access control.
- Key for Garage experience is available. You will be able to enjoy in-garage delivery, and everyday garage monitoring and control.
- Multiple Home and Garage kits

- You can now opt-in for Touch ID / Face ID login as part of setup. You can also enable this feature from Settings.
- Minor bug fixes and improvements.

• We made it easy for you to manage your delivery and everyday lock activity notifications in settings.
• Issues with accounting linking between Key and myQ accounts have been resolved.
• Other bug fixes and minor improvements.

- Cloud Cam standard edition is now supported in Garage and applicable Home situation
- Fixed issues encountered during accounting linking with Liftmaster myQ
- Other bug fixes and improvements

- Key for Garage users can now opt in to allow in-garage deliveries when their cameras happen to go offline during deliveries.
- Bug fixes and general improvements.

- You can now change address in Settings.
- Bug fixes and general improvements.
New delivery experience offerings and app improvements.
Key customers can now share delivery and access control benefits with their friends and family.
Key customers can now share delivery and access control benefits with their friends and family.
Added delivery customization features and other improvements.
